(Inferno, I know the ship is not the Darkside, but Quickstrike reformated 
the computer into the Darkside's files, so he's calling it the Darkside.)


Quickstrike:




Quickstrike's panting slowed. His damage was taking over him.

"Ah'm goin' t' get mah repairs," he announced to his comrades. He skittered 
out into the corridors, passing rooms and closed doors. He crawled into the 
repair room, where the CR chambers stood. He still wasn't used to the 
chambers. He was used to the tanks the Darkside once had. But the Darkside 
was dead. Sadly. He liked that ship.

He transformed to his robot mode, and once his feet hit the floor, he 
stumbled and screamed. He caught himself, using his arms for balance. He 
stood, baring the pain. On a panel in the room, a fur pelt laid. It was the 
fur pelt Rowdy Wolf gave him on his trip back home. And on the floor, was 
the torn headband. He shook his head.

He sighed and limped painfully into the CR cahmber. It closed behind him.
